---
name: Bug Report
about: Report a problem or unexpected behavior
title: "[BUG]"
labels: bug
assignees: 
---

## Summary
Briefly describe the bug, how you found it, and your system info (OS, version).  
Example: *"Compiler crashes when parsing `src/main.c` on Windows 11, found at 3:15 PM on 11/5/2025."*

## Steps to Reproduce
1. What you were doing when you found the bug
2. Steps to reliably recreate the bug

## Expected Behavior
Describe what you expected to happen instead of the bug.

## System Details
- OS and version
- Compiler version
- Any relevant environment info (terminal, IDE, etc.)

## Additional Information
Anything else that might help diagnose the problem (logs, screenshots, code snippets, etc.).
